Blockchain & Web3

Webomage builds and maintains blockchain and web3 backends, from infrastructure to smart contract integrations and DApp support.

Focus Areas

  • Ethereum-based applications using web3.py and related tooling
  • Wallet creation, transaction signing, and secure key management
  • Smart contract integrations, ICO/sidechain scenarios, and DeFi protocols
  • Indexing and analytics with The Graph (subgraphs) and related services
  • Running and maintaining blockchain nodes and supporting infrastructure

Example Work

  • Ripple/Stellar and Hyperledger Sawtooth
    Participated in crafting and deploying Ripple/Stellar verification nodes and Intel/IBM Hyperledger Sawtooth–based universal blockchain systems.

  • DeFi platforms (TokensFarm, DcentraLab, 2key Network)
    Developed DeFi backends with Python (web3.py, eth-abi), integrating with Ethereum nodes and smart contracts. Implemented subgraphs, DApp APIs, and CI/CD for blockchain workloads.

  • Web3 integrations & infrastructure hardening
    Solved complex web3 issues around nonce handling, gas spikes, and provider behavior. Migrated shared IPFS to dedicated storage, hosted The Graph instances, and hardened RPC nodes.

See also the dedicated case study: DeFi Infrastructure Hardening & Observability.

Typical Deliverables

  • Backend services and APIs for DApps and DeFi platforms
  • Infrastructure on AWS/Kubernetes tailored for blockchain workloads
  • Monitoring and alerting around node health, transaction flows, and contracts
  • Secure integrations with third-party APIs (Coingecko, 1inch, DexGuru, DefiLlama, etc.)

➡️ If you need production-grade blockchain or Web3 infrastructure and integrations, start a conversation.
